sentence.Network_en: " The wife of your father's brother " is a circumlocution for " your aunt ".
sentence.Network_cn: “ 你爸爸的兄弟的妻子 ” 是 “ 你婶子 ” 的累赘的说法.

sentence.Network_en: He is a master at circumlocution.
It was always when you most wanted a direct answer that Greenfield came up with a circumlocution.
sentence.Network_cn: 总是在你最想得到一个直截了当的回答时，格林菲尔德却要绕上十八个弯。

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE 词汇表(红宝书) - 豆丁网 ... circuitous adj. 迂回的，绕圈子的 circumlocution n. 迂回累赘的陈述 circumscribe v. 限制.
字根字尾构词法.doc - 豆丁网 ... circumference 圆周,周围 circumlocution 婉转曲折的说法 circumscribe 限制,立界限.
circumference 圆周circumlocution 迂回操作circumnutation 回旋转头运动
circumlittoral 沿海的circumlocution 婉转的说法circumlocutory 委婉曲折的

list.abs: ...irclet circuit circuitous circuity绕圈子 circuitry电路图circumcise circumspect circumference circumlocution迂回说法circumnavigate circumscribe circumstance circumsta.
...暗示 insinuate allude implicate innuendo intimate婉转的表述 inkling circuitous circumlocution euphemism分配，给予，分发 allocate allot
The use of circumlocution ., 迂回使用迂回的说法.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin circumlocutio(n-) (translating Greek periphrasis), from circum 'around' + locutio(n-) from loqui 'speak'

entry.tran: 婉转曲折的表达法;迂回表达
entry.def: A circumlocution is a way of saying or writing something using more words than are necessary instead of being clear and direct.

example.ex: It was always when you most wanted a direct answer that Greenfield came up with a circumlocution.
example.tran: 总是在你最想得到一个直截了当的回答时，格林菲尔德却要绕上十八个弯。

means.word_mean: 1. a style that involves indirect ways of expressing things
2. an indirect way of expressing something

auth_sentence.content: The move to windy circumlocution shows no signs of slowing.
auth_sentence.res_content: The move to windy circumlocution shows no signs of slowing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The move to windy circumlocution shows no signs of slowing.

auth_sentence.content: On the contrary, he lamented, as far as the media are concerned, circumlocution has become the order of the day.
auth_sentence.res_content: On the contrary, he lamented, as far as the media are concerned, circumlocution has become the order of the day.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: On the contrary, he lamented, as far as the media are concerned, circumlocution has become the order of the day.

auth_sentence.content: Ideas that could be expressed only as a clunky circumlocution in English can be collapsed into a single word in Ithkuil.
auth_sentence.res_content: Ideas that could be expressed only as a clunky circumlocution in English can be collapsed into a single word in Ithkuil.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ideas that could be expressed only as a clunky circumlocution in English can be collapsed into a single word in Ithkuil.

sentences.en: He is a master at circumlocution.
“The wife of your father’s brother” is a circumlocution for “your aunt”.
sentences.cn: “你爸爸的兄弟的妻子”是“你婶子”的累赘的说法。
